name: Hooked Protocol
description: Hooked Protocol is building the on-ramp layer for massive Web3 adoption, providing tailored Learn & Earn products and onboarding infrastructures for users & businesses to enter the new world of web3. Its first pilot product, Wild Cash, with Quiz-to-Earn experience and other gamified learning features, achieved an impressive growth of over 2 million monthly active users. Hooked Protocol adopts an innovative single token (HOOK) oriented structure, supplemented with in-ecosystem only utility token HGT (Hooked Gold Token). HOOK is the governance token of the ecosystem.
